item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
This Privacy Policy describes the procedures for collecting, using, storing, and protecting information of users of the Language Chatbot website and application (hereinafter referred to as the “Service”).

Contact for questions regarding personal data processing:
Email: codingpas@gmail.com

1. General Provisions

1.1. By using the Service, the user confirms their agreement with this Privacy Policy.

1.2. If the user disagrees with the terms of the Policy, they must stop using the Service.
